forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Low 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
